allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(ci\): install Tauri v2 system dependencies for Linux

Use libwebkit2gtk-4.1-dev, libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-dev, and
libsoup-3.0-dev instead of libwebkit2gtk-4.0-dev \(Tauri v1\).

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "c:\\Users\\henri\\Projets\\ragkit_desktop" add desktop/src/components/wizard/WizardContainer.tsx desktop/src/hooks/useWizard.ts ragkit/desktop/api/wizard.py ragkit/desktop/documents.py ragkit/desktop/models.py desktop/src-tauri/tauri.conf.json desktop/src-tauri/Cargo.toml desktop/package.json pyproject.toml ragkit/desktop/main.py desktop/src/locales/fr.json desktop/src/locales/en.json)

Bash(git -C "c:\\Users\\henri\\Projets\\ragkit_desktop" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: remove min_length=1 on SourceConfig.path causing wizard completion to silently fail

SourceConfig\(path=""\) in analyze_profile violated the min_length=1 constraint,
causing a Pydantic ValidationError that made the entire completeWizard flow fail
silently \(error caught, button appeared non-functional\).

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "c:\\Users\\henri\\Projets\\ragkit_desktop" add ragkit/desktop/models.py desktop/src-tauri/tauri.conf.json desktop/src-tauri/Cargo.toml desktop/package.json pyproject.toml ragkit/desktop/main.py desktop/src/locales/fr.json desktop/src/locales/en.json)

Bash(git -C "c:\\Users\\henri\\Projets\\ragkit_desktop" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: move SettingsPayload before WizardCompletionRequest to fix forward ref \(v1.0.9\)

WizardCompletionRequest referenced SettingsPayload which was defined after it
in models.py. Pydantic could not resolve the forward reference, causing the
backend to crash at import time. The /api/wizard/complete endpoint was never
registered, making the "Terminer la configuration" button silently fail.

Verified with FastAPI TestClient: analyze-profile, complete, and
get_ingestion_config all return 200.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "c:\\Users\\henri\\Projets\\ragkit_desktop" add ragkit/desktop/api/wizard.py ragkit/desktop/main.py ragkit/desktop/models.py desktop/src/components/wizard/FileTypesStep.tsx desktop/src/components/wizard/WizardContainer.tsx desktop/src/hooks/useDocuments.ts desktop/src/components/settings/IngestionSettings.tsx desktop/src-tauri/tauri.conf.json desktop/src-tauri/Cargo.toml desktop/package.json pyproject.toml desktop/src/locales/fr.json desktop/src/locales/en.json)

Bash(git -C "c:\\Users\\henri\\Projets\\ragkit_desktop" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: remove blocking document analysis from wizard completion \(v1.1.0\)

Root cause: complete_wizard synchronously parsed 1436 files \(280 MB\) before
responding. The HTTP request hung for minutes, making the button appear broken.

Changes:
- Remove documents.analyze_documents\(\) from complete_wizard endpoint
- Add loading spinner + "Enregistrement..." state to complete button
- Auto-trigger analysis when Settings page loads \(if no cached documents\)
- Add analyzing state with progress indicator in Metadata tab
- TypeScript compiles clean, Python tests pass \(complete in 0.01s\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
